action.name: Set value
action.param: "The moment you wake up, you realize that you we're not in a familiar place"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "You took a moment to look around"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "The longer you look around, the more you started hear noises"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Suddenly, that car is getting louder and louder"

sub-events.comment: Transition from center dialogue to bottom dialogue

action.name: Set value
action.param: "What I didn't expect is that, a cute girl was driving some sort of sport car"

sub-events.comment: Use bottom dialogue for further references

action.name: Set value
action.param: "The girl just smirked on me, like she was flexing me or something"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Well I guess I just need to play around"

action.name: Set value
action.param: """It would be very helpful if you can show me what's going on"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """This place is called Daikoku Parking Area"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """A place where all Car Enthusiats gather around"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: "I never liked a person who loves about car"

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Well... since you're here why don't you help me park my car?"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """So your name is '" & PlayerName & "' is it?"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """My name is " & RibariiNijuuhachi.FullName & " and nice to meet you!"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """If you weren't there, I probably burns my clutch or something"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: "Which I probably did? I hope not"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "I do smells something burns, I hope she doesnt notice about it"

action.name: Set value
action.param: """You guys shouldn't park here, or you might cause some trouble"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Whaaaatt? This is a public place mister 'SO COOL' and we all free to park anywhere"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Maybe we shouldn't park here after all, it's full of black cars"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: "I feel like there's someone who's creeping at us"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "I dunno, maybe it was just my imagination or something? I'm not so sure"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "As I thought about that, we are indeed being creeped"

action.name: Set value
action.param: "There's a suspicious looking guy behind us"

action.name: Set value
action.param: """C'MON LET'S CATCH HIM BEFORE HE GETS TO HIS CAR"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: "He then quickly gets to his car and gets out of the parking lot"

action.name: Set value
action.param: """QUICK GET BACK TO MY CAR AND CATCH HIM"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Wait, aren't you the guy from earlier?"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """I'm Akira Hara, just call me Hara in short"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """And I'm sorry about that, I've been told to steal your wallet by the 'Black Cars Gang' that I warned you earlier"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """They said you don't deserve to park in their spot"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Well, you're lucky that right now we're at the roadside and I don't want to argue right now"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """And you both are actually lucky aswell"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Because here you go, here's your wallet"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: "I didn't really expect that it would be this easy"

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Hey man, if you want to say something to us, just tell us already"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """As I said mentioned before that 'You guys are lucky'..."""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """'The Black Cars' gang are actually headed this way right now"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """So get out of here before they get here"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """Facing 'The Black Cars' gang all by yourself?"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """What if they ask you that you didn't have the wallet"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """My car is fast for a reason"""

action.name: Set value
action.param: """I can hear their engine sounds getting closer and closer"""
